enhanced_by.reason: Creating an isolated margin listen key is a prerequisite for extending it.
Parameter validation is required before extending the isolated margin listen key.
Closing the isolated margin listen key can be used to verify the state after extending it.

enhanced_by.method_name: requestHandler.sendApiRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The response from the API request can be used to assert the success of the extend operation.
